name: es6-import-validate
description: A simple ES6 Harmony Module import statement validator

scripts.test: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint lib/*.js test/*.js test/fixtures/*.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R spec
scripts.coverage: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint lib/*.js test/*.js test/fixtures/*.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -r blanket -R html-cov > coverage.html && open coverage.html
